downloadDescription: Manage a cybersecurity incident while avoiding common errors, increasing both the effectiveness and efficiency of your incident response efforts.
detailsSection: Incident response is the practice of investigating and remediating active cyberattack campaigns on your organization. Quick and efficient incident response practices can determine how well your security operations are able to reduce organizational risk. This guide describes how to manage cybersecurity incidents while avoiding common errors.
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
